pages.title: Advanced Spells
pages.text: A compendium of the spells that only the dark wands can cast. $(br2)(This wand can also perform the apprentice spells except bubble related and defense).

pages.title: Lava Bubble
pages.text: Drags your target towards you. Also, heals it.

pages.title: Self Lava Bubble I
pages.text: Pressing $(k:turtlemancy.selfbubble) you can go into the direction you are looking.

pages.title: Trader Burst
pages.text: There is nothing more anoying than the Wandering Trader. Proper Turtlemancer are always so nice to everyone... $(br)Not like us, some badass Improper Turtlemancers... Make him explode! Free emeralds! No one wants his useless trades anyways! Make him explode!

pages.title: Evil Defense
pages.text: Use the wand while sneaking to get $(thing)Fire Resistance II$() at the cost of getting $(thing)Slowness I$().
